tools.name: run_command
tools.description: Execute a bash command in the sandbox environment.

timeout.description: Maximum seconds to wait for the command (default 30).

tools.name: finish
tools.description: Mark the task as complete and end the session. Optionally provide a list of file paths (relative to the sandbox working directory) to save as permanent output files.

paths.description: File paths in the sandbox to save as output.

task_prompt: Write a Python script called hello.py that prints 'Hello, World!'. Run it to verify it works, then finish the task and save hello.py as output.
system_prompt: You are a capable coding assistant with access to a bash sandbox. Use the run_command tool to execute bash commands. When you have completed the task, call the finish tool. If you created output files you want to keep, pass their paths to finish.

tools.name: run_command
tools.description: Execute a bash command in the sandbox environment.

timeout.description: Maximum seconds to wait for the command (default 30).

tools.name: finish
tools.description: Mark the task as complete and end the session. Optionally provide a list of file paths (relative to the sandbox working directory) to save as permanent output files.

paths.description: File paths in the sandbox to save as output.

task_prompt: Write a Python script called fibonacci.py that computes and prints the first 20 Fibonacci numbers, one per line. Run it to verify the output, then finish the task and save fibonacci.py as output.
system_prompt: You are a capable coding assistant with access to a bash sandbox. Use the run_command tool to execute bash commands. When you have completed the task, call the finish tool. If you created output files you want to keep, pass their paths to finish.
